price: Sọ pé: “Ẹ tẹ̀lé (ti) Allāhu àti Òjíṣẹ́. Tí ẹ bá sì pẹ̀yìn dà, dájúdájú Allāhu kò nífẹ̀ẹ́ àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
